name: Editor
description: Editor groups a collection of contents in tabs.

readonly.label: readonly
readonly.title: Whether to instantiate the editor to readonly mode.

formats.label: formats
formats.title: Whitelist of formats to display, see here for available options.

modules.label: modules
modules.title: Modules configuration, see here for available options.

pt.label: pt
pt.title: Used to pass attributes to DOM elements inside the component.

pt-options.label: ptOptions
pt-options.title: Used to configure passthrough(pt) options of the component.

unstyled.label: unstyled
unstyled.title: When enabled, it removes component related styles in the core.
